const isOnMobile = () => { let bottombar = document.querySelector('.nc-bottombar'); return bottombar && bottombar.getClientRects().length > 0; }; const closeSidebar = () => { $tw.wiki.setText('$:/state/notebook-sidebar', 'text', undefined, 'no'); }; const closeSidebarOnMobile = () => { if (isOnMobile()) { console.log('closing sidebar'); closeSidebar(); } }; const setup = () => { $tw.hooks.addHook('th-navigating', function (event) { closeSidebarOnMobile(); return event; }); }; setup(); exports.closeNotebookSidebar = closeSidebar; })(); ","type":"application/javascript"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/landing/layout-url":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/landing/layout-url","tags":"$:/tags/StartupAction/PostRender","text":" <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}match[file:]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="FileWarning"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}match[?announcement=yes]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="announcement"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}match[?layout=neotw]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/Layout"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}match[?layout=tailwindcss]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tailwindcss-plus/Layout"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}match[?layout=lockscreen]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/landing/layout"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}match[?layout=0]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/layout" text="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/landing/layout"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}prefix[?filter=temp]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/DefaultTiddlers" text="[field:temp[yes]!sort[modified]]"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}prefix[?filter=oeyoews]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/DefaultTiddlers" text="[[oeyoews]]"/> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/search}prefix[?filter=articles]]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/DefaultTiddlers" text="[field:publish[article]!sort[modified]]"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/caption/cn/display-caption":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/caption/cn/display-caption","text":"\whitespace trim

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/landing/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/landing/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":" .o-landing { margin: 1em 0.5em; } @media (min-width: 760px) { .o-landing { width: 660px; margin: 1em auto; } } .o-landing-branding { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 4em; } .o-landing-branding h1 { font-weight: bold; } .landing-button-start { padding: 10px; font-weight: bold; } .landing-button-start:hover { transform: scale(0.95); background-color: aliceblue !important; transition: transform 0.2s; } .o-landing-panel { margin-bottom: 2em; padding: 1em 2em; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 12px; <> } .o-landing-panel h2 { font-weight: bold; } "},"FileWarning":{"title":"FileWarning","class":"o-tm","mask-closable":"yes","text":"

macrodef macrocallinline .o-btn-back { background-color: #00000008; border-radius: 50%; padding: 0 0 5px; margin: 0 0 9px; display: block; box-shadow: 0 5px 20px #0000001f } .o-btn-back:hover { transform: scale(1.1); transition: transform 0.2s; } #stx-story-top { position: fixed; bottom: 3.2rem; right: 1.2rem; font-size: 24px; z-index: 899; } #stx-story-top button { width: 40px; height: 40px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; border: none; min-width: 1.5em; } #stx-story-top { } #stx-story-top:hover { transition: all 0.3s ease; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-text { margin-left: 0.3em; vertical-align: middle; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-invisible { font-size: 0.75em; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/to-top/ui":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/to-top/ui","tags":"$:/tags/PageTemplate","text":"\define home-button() <$button tooltip="Back to home" class="o-btn-back" aria-label='home'> <$action-navigate $to="GettingStarted" $scroll="yes"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> \end <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]count[]match[0]]">

exports.random = function (n, t, r) { var e, o = [], a = [], i = parseInt(t.operand || '1'); if (isNaN(i)) { i = 1; } n(function (n, t) { a.push(t); }); while (i && a.length) { e = Math.floor(Math.random() * a.length); o.push(a[e]); a.splice(e, 1); i--; } return o; }; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"filteroperator"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/prevent-edit.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/prevent-edit.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/prevent-edit.js type: application/javascript module-type: startup prevent-edit \*/ (function () { exports.startup = function () { $tw.unloadTasks = $tw.unloadTasks.filter( (task) => !task.toString().includes('confirmationMessage'), ); }; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/startup/neotw.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/startup/neotw.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/startup/neotw.js type: application/javascript // module-type: startup neotw startup descption \*/ (function () { exports.platforms = ['browser']; exports.after = ['story']; exports.synchronous = true; exports.startup = function () { if (!$tw.browser) return; // const tempTitle = $tw.wiki.getTiddlerText('$:/temp/focussedTiddler'); // TODO: not work if (window.location.protocol === 'http:') { document.title = `🐬 ${document.title}`; } /* 这行代码是一个箭头函数，用于将响应体转换成一个JSON格式的对象。在fetch函数中，响应体返回的是一个ReadableStream对象，需要通过调用json()方法来获取JSON格式的数据。 response.json()方法返回一个Promise对象，该Promise对象会在解析完成后，resolve一个JSON格式的对象。由于Promise对象的then方法可以接受一个回调函数作为参数，因此我们可以直接将response.json()作为回调函数传递给第一个then方法，让它自动处理响应数据并返回一个JSON格式的对象。 简单来说，这行代码是对响应数据进行了一次转换操作，可以使得后续的代码更加方便地使用响应数据，同时也提高了代码的可读性和易用性。 */ /* fetch('https://api.github.com/repos/oeyoews/neotw/commits/main') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log( `%c Lastest Commit：${data.commit.author.date} https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw`, 'background: linear-gradient(to right, #12c2e9, #c471ed); color: black;padding: 3px;', ), ) .catch(error => console.error(error)); */ // 获取仓库的 tag 列表并选择最新的那个 tag /* fetch('https://api.github.com/repos/oeyoews/neotw/tags') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { const latestTag = data[0].name; console.log( `%c Neotw version is ${latestTag}`, 'background: linear-gradient(to right, #12c2e9, #c471ed); color: black;padding: 3px;', ); }) .catch(error => console.error(error)); */ /* fetch('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oeyoews/neotw/main/package.json', { headers: { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0' }, }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log( `%c Neotw version is ${data.version}`, 'background: linear-gradient(to right, #12c2e9, #c471ed); color: black;padding: 3px;', ), ) .catch(error => console.error(error)); */ console.log( '%c A modern style notebook based on tiddlywiki. @oeyoews 🎉', 'background: linear-gradient(to right, #12c2e9, #c471ed, #f64f59); color: black;border-radius: 3px;padding: 3px;', ); }; })(); ","type":"application/javascript"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/custom-css":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/custom-css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\define hide-tiddler-controls() [data-tiddler-title="$(currentTiddler)$"] .tc-titlebar h2 { text-transform: capitalize; } \end <$list filter="[!is[system]]"> <> <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]count[]match[0]]"> .tc-tiddler-controls {display: none !important;} <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]count[]match[0]]"> .nc-topbar { display: none !important; } <$list filter="[[$:/temp/zen-mode]get[text]match[yes]]"> .gk0wk-notionpagebg, .nc-topbar { display: none !important; } [data-tiddler-title] .tc-tiddler-controls {display: none !important;} <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]count[]match[0]]"> .nc-topbar { display: none !important; } .custom-details { border-radius: 10px; padding: 0 10px; display: inline; color: #aaa; } .custom-details[open] { display: block; } .custom-details:not([open]):hover { transform: scale(1.1); transition: transform .2s; } .custom-details>summary { border-radius: 6px; background-color: transparent; margin-right: 2px; } .custom-details>summary::marker { content:""; } .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal, .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-header, .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-body, .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-footer { border-radius: 10px; border: none; background-color: #F5F5F5; } .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-footer { display:none; } .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-header { text-transform: capitalize; }"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/footer":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/footer","","text":"<$list filter="[{$:/layout}match[$:/core/ui/PageTemplate]]"> footer { text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; flex: 1 1 auto; display:flex !important; justify-content:center; align-items: center; z-index:-1; color: gray; user-select: none; padding: 2px; font-size: 50%; } <$list filter="[{$:/layout}!match[$:/core/ui/PageTemplate]]"> footer { display: none !important; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/tag-count":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/tag-count","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".tc-tag-label:after { color: gray; opacity: calc(2/3); vertical-align: middle; } <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]]" variable=tag> <$set name=cssTag filter="[escapecss[]]" select=0> [data-tag-title=<>] .tc-tag-label:after { content: " <$count filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag]" />"; } .tc-untagged-label:after { content: "<$count filter="[untagged[]!is[system]] -[tags[]]"/>"; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/user-panel-avatar":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/user-panel-avatar","text":".user-panel-avatar { position: relative; max-width: 22px; max-height: 22px; } .user-panel-avatar img { width: 100%; height: auto; max-width: 22px; max-height: 22px; border-radius: 50%; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; } .user-panel-avatar-124 { position: relative; max-width: 124px; max-height: 124px; } .user-panel-avatar-124 img { width: 100%; height: auto; max-width: 124px; max-height: 124px; border-radius: 50% !important; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; } ","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/ContributionBanner":{"title":"$:/ContributionBanner","list-after":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title","text":" \define base-github() https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/edit/main/tiddlers/ \end <$set name="draft-of" value={{{ [get[draft.of]] }}}> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}match[https:]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/config/OriginalTiddlerPaths]getindex]" variable="target" >

<$list filter="[$is$[system]$subfilter$has[$dateField$]!sort[$dateField$]limit[$limit$]eachday[$dateField$]]">
